GUATEMALA CITY (AP) The Guatemalan government on Sunday denied that U.S. authorities deported a Chilean man to the Central American country.

articles.title: How Canada became the centre of a measles outbreak in North America - BBC
articles.description: Confirmed cases of measles in Canada are nearly three times higher than in the US, despite Canada's far smaller population.
articles.content:
Nadine Yousif
Catalina Friesen serves with a mobile clinic in Ontario
